title: Mount Robillard
description: Jainah is a Terraform planet located in the area of the Ziroshel Union. The solar system has two inhabited planets (the other one is called Jehan) orbiting around twin suns.Mount Robillard is the tale of a rebel group fighting against the Ziroshel Union. This bunch of rebels has for years been engaged in a fight against the Union, but now the rebels are facing new challenges.Status: CompleteWord count: approx. 125,101
author: Quatorze
